commands.purge-by-recon-ids-to-keep: DELETE FROM audit_recon WHERE mapping LIKE ${includeMapping} AND mapping NOT LIKE ${excludeMapping} AND reconId NOT IN [${list:reconIds}]
commands.purge-by-recon-expired: DELETE FROM audit_recon WHERE mapping LIKE ${includeMapping} AND mapping NOT LIKE ${excludeMapping} AND timestamp < ${timestamp}

queries.for-userName-count: SELECT count(*) AS total FROM ${unquoted:_resource} WHERE userName = ${uid}
queries.links-for-linkType-count: SELECT count(*) AS total FROM ${unquoted:_resource} WHERE linkType = ${linkType}
queries.scan-tasks: SELECT * FROM ${unquoted:_resource} WHERE ${dotnotation:property} < ${condition.before} AND ${dotnotation:taskState.completed} is NULL SKIP ${unquoted:_pagedResultsOffset} LIMIT ${unquoted:_pageSize}
queries.get-managed-users-count: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM managed_user
queries.get-managed-users-filtered-count: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM managed_user LET $userNameLike = if(("${unquoted:userName}" = ''), '%%', "${unquoted:userName}%"), $mailLike = if((${mail} = ''), '%%', '${unquoted:mail}%'), $snLike = if(("${unquoted:sn}" = ''), '%%', "${unquoted:sn}%"), $givenNameLike = if(("${unquoted:givenName}" = ''), '%%', "${unquoted:givenName}%") WHERE  userName LIKE $userNameLike AND mail LIKE $mailLike AND sn LIKE $snLike AND givenName LIKE $givenNameLike AND (accountStatus = ${accountStatus} OR ${accountStatus} = '')
queries.get-notifications-for-user-count: select count(*) AS total FROM ${unquoted:_resource} WHERE receiverId = ${userId} order by createDate desc
queries.get-by-field-value-count: select count(*) AS total FROM ${unquoted:_resource} WHERE ${unquoted:field} = ${value}
queries.get-users-of-direct-role-count: select count(_openidm_id) AS total FROM ${unquoted:_resource} WHERE roles matches '^(.*,)?${unquoted:role}(,.*)?$' OR ${role} IN roles
queries.audit-by-recon-id-type: select * FROM audit_recon WHERE reconId = ${reconId} AND entryType = ${entryType}
queries.query-cluster-failed-instances: SELECT * FROM cluster_states WHERE timestamp <= ${timestamp} AND (state = '1' OR state = '2')
queries.links-for-firstId: SELECT * FROM ${unquoted:_resource} WHERE linkType = ${linkType} AND firstId = ${firstId} SKIP ${unquoted:_pagedResultsOffset} LIMIT ${unquoted:_pageSize}
queries.for-userName: SELECT * FROM ${unquoted:_resource} WHERE userName = ${uid} SKIP ${unquoted:_pagedResultsOffset} LIMIT ${unquoted:_pageSize}
queries.links-for-firstId-count: SELECT count(*) AS total FROM ${unquoted:_resource} WHERE linkType = ${linkType} AND firstId = ${firstId}
queries.audit-by-recon-id-situations-latest-filt: SELECT sourceObjectId,targetObjectId,ambiguousTargetObjectIds,timestamp,situation FROM audit_recon WHERE reconId = ${reconId} AND (${completed} = '' OR timestamp <= ${completed}) AND situation IN [${list:situations}] AND (sourceObjectId IN [${list:filteredIds}] OR targetObjectId IN [${list:filteredIds}]) ORDER BY timestamp DESC SKIP ${unquoted:_pagedResultsOffset} LIMIT ${unquoted:_pageSize}
queries.links-for-secondId-count: SELECT count(*) AS total FROM ${unquoted:_resource} WHERE linkType = ${linkType} AND secondId = ${secondId} SKIP ${unquoted:_pagedResultsOffset} LIMIT ${unquoted:_pageSize}
queries.audit-by-recon-id-situation: select * FROM audit_recon WHERE reconId = ${reconId} AND situation = ${situation}
queries.links-for-linkType: SELECT * FROM ${unquoted:_resource} WHERE linkType = ${linkType} SKIP ${unquoted:_pagedResultsOffset} LIMIT ${unquoted:_pageSize}
queries.get-managed-users-filtered: SELECT _openidm_id, userName, mail, givenName, sn, accountStatus FROM managed_user LET $userNameLike = if(("${unquoted:userName}" = ''), '%%', "${unquoted:userName}%"), $mailLike = if((${mail} = ''), '%%', '${unquoted:mail}%'), $snLike = if(("${unquoted:sn}" = ''), '%%', "${unquoted:sn}%"), $givenNameLike = if(("${unquoted:givenName}" = ''), '%%', "${unquoted:givenName}%") WHERE userName LIKE $userNameLike AND mail LIKE $mailLike AND sn LIKE $snLike AND givenName LIKE $givenNameLike AND (accountStatus = ${accountStatus} OR ${accountStatus} = '') ORDER BY ${unquoted:orderBy} ${unquoted:orderByDir} SKIP ${unquoted:_pagedResultsOffset} LIMIT ${unquoted:_pageSize}
queries.get-recons: SELECT reconId, timestamp, mapping, message FROM audit_recon WHERE mapping LIKE ${includeMapping} AND mapping NOT LIKE ${excludeMapping} AND entryType = 'summary' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
queries.links-for-secondId: SELECT * FROM ${unquoted:_resource} WHERE linkType = ${linkType} AND secondId = ${secondId} SKIP ${unquoted:_pagedResultsOffset} LIMIT ${unquoted:_pageSize}
queries.audit-last-recon-for-mapping: select * from audit_recon where entryType = 'start' and mapping = ${mapping} and reconAction <> 'reconById' order by timestamp desc limit 1
queries.audit-by-recon-id-situations-latest: SELECT sourceObjectId,targetObjectId,ambiguousTargetObjectIds,timestamp,situation FROM audit_recon WHERE reconId = ${reconId} AND (${completed} = '' OR timestamp <= ${completed}) AND situation IN [${list:situations}] ORDER BY timestamp DESC SKIP ${unquoted:_pagedResultsOffset} LIMIT ${unquoted:_pageSize}
queries.get-users-of-direct-role: select * FROM ${unquoted:_resource} WHERE roles matches '^(.*,)?${unquoted:role}(,.*)?$' OR ${role} IN roles SKIP ${unquoted:_pagedResultsOffset} LIMIT ${unquoted:_pageSize}
queries.scan-tasks-count: SELECT count(*) AS total FROM ${unquoted:_resource} WHERE ${dotnotation:property} < ${condition.before} AND ${dotnotation:taskState.completed} is NULL
queries.get-managed-users: SELECT _openidm_id, userName, mail, givenName, sn, accountStatus FROM managed_user ORDER BY ${unquoted:orderBy} ${unquoted:orderByDir} SKIP ${unquoted:_pagedResultsOffset} LIMIT ${unquoted:_pageSize}
queries.credential-query: SELECT * FROM ${unquoted:_resource} WHERE userName = ${username} AND coalesce(accountStatus, 'active') <> 'inactive'
queries.get-notifications-for-user: select * FROM ${unquoted:_resource} WHERE receiverId = ${userId} order by createDate desc SKIP ${unquoted:_pagedResultsOffset} LIMIT ${unquoted:_pageSize}
